import {useState} from 'react' import './form.css' import img from '../image/green.png' const Form = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ AccountNumber : '', CustomerId: '', MobileNumber:'', DOB:'' }) const inputData = (events) => { const {name, value} = events.target setData((prev) => { return{ ...prev, [name]: value } }) } return ( <>

) } export default Form
